name: code_linter
description: Analyzes code artifact syntax for potential errors. (Basic checks)

artifactId.description: The ID of the artifact to lint.

cycle.description: The cycle number of the artifact version.

language.description: The language/type of the code artifact.

name: json_validator
description: Validates the JSON structure of a specific artifact version.

artifactId.description: The ID of the JSON artifact.

cycle.description: The cycle number of the artifact version.

name: read_artifact
description: Reads and returns the full content of a specific artifact version.

cycle.description: The cycle number of the artifact version.

name: list_artifacts
description: Lists latest artifact metadata based on optional filters.

filterType.description: Optional: Filter by type (e.g., JS, CSS, WEB_COMPONENT_DEF).

filterPattern.description: Optional: Filter artifact IDs by a regex pattern.

includeAllVersions.description: Optional: If true, returns all versions. Default false.

name: diff_text
description: Performs a basic line-by-line difference check between two text inputs.

name: convert_to_gemini_fc
description: Converts an MCP-style tool definition into the Gemini FunctionDeclaration format.

mcpToolDefinition.description: A tool definition object following the MCP Tool schema.

name: code_edit
description: Validates proposed code edits for an artifact. Used internally by HITL.

artifactId.description: The ID of the artifact being edited.

cycle.description: The cycle number of the original artifact version.

versionId.description: Optional: Specific version ID of the original artifact.

name: run_self_evaluation
description: Executes a self-evaluation task using an LLM based on defined criteria and a target.

targetArtifactId.description: The ID of the artifact/proposal being evaluated.

targetArtifactCycle.description: The cycle number of the target.

evalDefinitionId.description: Optional: ID of an EVAL_DEF artifact.

name: apply_diff_patch
description: Applies a standard diff patch to a text artifact. (Placeholder - Needs library)

artifactId.description: ID of the artifact to patch.

cycle.description: Cycle of the original artifact version.

name: apply_json_patch
description: Applies a JSON Patch (RFC 6902) to a JSON artifact. (Placeholder - Needs library)

artifactId.description: ID of the JSON artifact to patch.

cycle.description: Cycle of the original JSON artifact version.

patchContent.description: An array of JSON Patch operations.

name: define_web_component
description: Defines a new custom HTML element (Web Component) from a JS class string, registers it, and saves its definition as an artifact.

tagName.description: The tag name for the custom element (must contain a hyphen, e.g., 'my-element').

classContent.description: The JavaScript string content of the class extending HTMLElement.

targetArtifactId.description: The artifact ID where the Web Component definition (classContent) will be saved (e.g., 'target.webcomponent.my-element-def').

description.description: A brief description of the web component for its artifact metadata.
